entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 1.0.0.178. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of package dqc_15_concepts.csv and dqc_0011.csv successful. - /var/folders/18/_kbcbv855dxf82x5yvny6h0c0000gn/T/tmp9v3_o1sa/packages/resources.zip

[DQC.US.0011.6822] It is expected that AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurrencyTranslationAdjustmentNetOfTax with a value of -800,000 reported in the network role http://www.imation.com/role/ShareholdersEquityAccumulatedOtherComprehensiveLossDetails should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest with the dimension us-gaap:StatementEquityComponentsAxis = us-gaap:AccumulatedTranslationAdjustmentMember and a reported value of -700,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.imation.com/role/ShareholdersEquityAccumulatedOtherComprehensiveLossDetails. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this us-gaap:AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurrencyTranslationAdjustmentNetOfTax fact are:
Period : 2017-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD Decimals of AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurrencyTranslationAdjustmentNetOfTax : -5 Decimals of StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest : -5 Rule version: 9.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1014111/000101411118000002/imn-20171231.xml 4154

property.name: label
property.value: Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Translation Adjustment, Net of Tax
